meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the epic poem "The Odyssey" by Homer.
meanings.sent1: The students put on an odyssean play based on the adventures of Odysseus.
meanings.sent2: Her storytelling had an odyssean quality, captivating the audience with tales of distant lands.
meanings.sent3: The cat's odyssean curiosity led it to explore every nook and cranny of the house.
meanings.sent4: His odyssean quest for knowledge took him to libraries and museums around the world.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted an odyssean scene of a ship battling mythical creatures in stormy seas.

meanings.definition: Marked by long and adventurous journeys or travels.
meanings.sent1: The explorer's odyssean spirit drove him to discover new lands beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent2: Their odyssean expedition through the jungle tested their survival skills.
meanings.sent3: The odyssean road trip turned into a series of unexpected and exciting detours.
meanings.sent4: She embarked on an odyssean adventure to climb the highest peaks on every continent.
meanings.sent5: The odyssean traveler's journal was filled with tales of encounters with exotic cultures.
